text.config.infinicraft-config.title: Infinicraft
text.config.infinicraft-config.option.CH:
Base URL of OpenAI-like API.
Example: https://api.openai.com/v1

Name of the model to use.
Example: llama3 for Ollama, or gpt-3.5-turbo for ChatGPT
text.config.infinicraft-config.option.SD:
The IP and port where the infinicraft-client is running.
Example: http://127.0.0.1:17707 for localhost on the default port
